Tiger Stance (Q) :
Mana Cost changed from 47/44/41/38/35 to 50 at all Ranks
[New] Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.
[Removed] Basic attacks no longer deal 15% AD bonus damage.
[Effect Change] Persistent effect and damage changed
DoT Effect now also happens on every third attack after the first.
Base DoT damage changed from 30/80/130/180/230 to 30/60/90/120/150
[New] New applications of Tiger Strike's DoT on a target already affected now deals remaining damage instantly.
"Persistent Effect: Udyr will perform a Tiger Strike with his first basic attack and every third attack after that, dealing bonus 30/60/90/120/150 (+120-160% total AD) physical damage over 2 seconds.

If a target is affected by Tiger Strike, a new application of Tiger Strike will deal the remaining damage instantly.

Activation: Increases Attack Speed by 30/40/50/60/70% for 5 seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up."

è³¢ä»”ä¸€é½Šå»é£ŸMè¨˜å¦¹


Responsibilities include, but not limited to :

Learning the basics of restaurant operations through on-site training, area management and floor management
Gaining experience in attaining and maintaining customer satisfaction
Developing an understanding of basic supervision, human relations, interpersonal communication and follow-up skills
Establishing an Individual Development Plan to help focus on personal career development objectives
Ensuring that a respectful workplace exists in the restaurant
From Manager Trainee, you will move up to the Shift Manager position where you actually begin to apply the skills you have learned during the Trainee period.



Requirements:


Graduate from university / college; or
Graduate from Vocational Institute (Associate Degree/Higher Diploma/Diploma/Certificate); or
F.7 or HKDSE level; or
F.5 level with 5 subjects pass (including English, Chinese and Mathematics)
Working experience is not necessary
Strong self-motivation, proactive and able to work under pressure
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Must be a good team player and is able to work in a dynamic environment
Willing to work on shift including overnight shift
5 days work per week
